transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji batao aap call kar rahi thi batao aap.
Customer: Haan haan mujhe laga aap kisi ki koi aur call aagya to aapne receive kar liya.
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi haan haan batao aap kya karoge aap isme phir.
Customer: Haan sir isme matlab sir dekho main to convert karke deal dunga nahi aapko koi zahir si baat hai.
Customer: Are yaar ye maine kaha kya aapko ek baar bhi maine kaha kya matlab aap unpractical baat kar rahe ho hogi aap se convert jante ho aap main kya deal karta hu kya hai.
Executive: Haan haan nahi nahi.
Customer: Matlab kya maine kaha kya ek baar bhi.
Executive: Clarity main.
Customer: Main aap se ye puch raha hu ye batao India mart aap se main use kar raha hu kya.
Executive: Aap se nahi.
Customer: To phir use kar main to convert karke dunga nahi maine kaha kya recorded line hai maine kaha ek baar bhi.
Executive: Haan call to recorded bhi hai sir matlab ye call record ki ja rahi hai.
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi to phir ye kaun sa wording aap use kar rahe maine main convert karke dunga nahi.
Executive: Are matlab main samjhana chah raha tha ki sir dekho aapko matlab.
Customer: Nahi aap kya samjhana chah rahe hain maine aaj tak kaha hai kya ki aap convert karke dijiye.
Executive: Nahi nahi kaha hai sir.
Customer: To phir.
Customer: Ye kya jatana chah rahe hain ki main to convert karke dunga nahi.
Executive: Ab sir dekhiye matlab aap main samajh nahi pa raha hu ki jaise aapne star services li thi.
Customer: Yaar inquiry poor aa rahi hai meri baat ko samjho inquiry improve honi chahiye aur ye sare restriction jo aa rahe hain kyu jo hai wo ho rahe hain ki review me ja raha hai kya ho raha hai mujhe nahi pata iske bare me kya ho raha hai.
Executive: Samajh me aaya to sir aapko kya sir restriction.
Customer: Nahi samajh me aaya sir abhi.
Executive: Nahi to ye phir kahan pe ja rahi hai ye cheez.
Executive: Kya kahan pe ja raha hai kahin nahi ja raha wo hamare paas hi ja raha hai.
Customer: Ye cheez kyu restriction kyu aa raha hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi maine maine bataya to.
Executive: Dekho kyu aa raha hai maine bataya to tha sir agar leather shoe me deal kar rahe ho to category leather shoe hi lagegi.
Executive: Aap shoes bhi lagana chah rahe ho sath me.
Customer: Meri baat ko samjho iski wajah se mera product visible hoga ya nahi meri baat ko samjho.
Executive: Hoga sir visible hoga visibility me koi problem nahi hai are aapko ye ek use kya kahoge notification aa raha hai ki sir aap jo product hai usme kuch category aur bhi add kar rahe ho jo ki matlab as per product nahi hai ye kehna chah raha hai.
Customer: Chandelier aap deal kar sakte ho mujhe.
Customer: Batao mujhe suno aap mujhe result acha kab tak aayega.
Executive: Sir kuch main iske liye to koi tippani nahi de sakta aapko.
Customer: Aapko maine starting me bola tha aapko maine starting yaad hai mujhe ache se jab aapki service activate hui thi uske just do din baad aapne call kiya tha aur aapne mujhe bola ki Ashraf jo hai maine star service le li mujhe koi business nahi aa raha.
Customer: Do din baad maine nahi call kiya tha aapko.
Executive: Ho sakta hai same day kar diya ho start hua ho services.
Customer: Same day bahut sahi main keh raha hu do din baad call nahi kiya tha aapko main aapko more than 10 days ya 20 days baad call kiya tha.
Executive: Exactly main abhi batata hu aapko maine abhi wahi history hi check kar raha tha aapka.
Customer: Hmm hmm check karo aap.
Executive: Aapki services live hui hai 9 october ko.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Aapki jo call
Executive: Mere paas yahan pe aayi hai.
Executive: Kahan gaya.
Executive: October mein.
Executive: Ye around aaya tha 20 20 19 20 mein aaya tha.
Customer: Kyu aap to keh rahe the same day call aagyi thi same day call aagyi thi aap keh rahe the.
Executive: Are nahi nahi nahi nahi 18 ko aayi hai sir.
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi kya hota hai are nahi maine dekha na abhi 18 october ko.
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi to us din to abhi to aapne immediately kaha ki nahi ji same day call aagyi.
Executive: Maine galat dekh liya hoga sir 18 october ko dekhte hain wahi to maine abhi phir se scroll back gaya na.
Customer: Meri baat meri baat badi dhyan se suno aap agar ye cheez satisfactory nahi hota within a week hai na isko trust seal me switch karo mera account immediately.
Executive: Sir dekho deal to convert kari nahi ja sakti na refund possible hai ab main aapko samjhata hu services aap use kariye properly aap use kar bhi rahe ho properly matlab aapki taraf se koi kami nahi hai main aapko pehle bata deta hu.
Customer: To main legal me convert karu phir legal me dalu phir kya chahte ho aap.
Executive: Jo aapki wording hai recorded line hai.
Customer: Recorded line aap bhi record kar lijiye sir.
Customer: Ab kya kehna chah rahe ho aap record kar lijiye.
Customer: Aapko jo hai nahi nahi suno suno aap matlab aapko is cheez ka koi fark nahi padta ye kehna chah rahe ho na.
Executive: Kyu fark nahi padta matlab kis tarike se.
Customer: Ki matlab aaye ya na aaye nahi refund hoga nahi isme trust seal me switch hogi ab jo hai services aap use karo.
Executive: Sir aap ye bataye ki business kyu nahi aayega ya pehle aapko business nahi aaya trust seal mein.
Customer: To trust seal me dal do na main isse itna payment karke main satisfied nahi hu na jo jispect.
Executive: Immediately aap satisfied ho jaoge kya sir matlab aap samajh nahi rahe yaar immediately kya hota hai more than two month hone ja raha hai immediately kya hota hai overnight maine bola tha do sir sir isko meri baat samajh me aa rahi hai ki nahi meri baat samajh me aa rahi hai main kya keh raha hu.
Executive: More than two months nahi hua hai sir.
Customer: Kya chahte ho main one year ka wait karu aapke response ke liye one year ka wait karu I am audible meri baat samajh me aati hai.
Executive: Main aisa nahi keh raha hu.
Customer: Meri baat samajh me aa rahi hai main kya keh raha hu.
Executive: Sir.
Executive: Aaram se baat kar rahe ho aap.
Customer: Main aaram se baat kar raha hu mera patience ka aap test le rahe ho Mr Mr Ashraf main bahut polite baat kar raha hu aap se.
Executive: Aapka patience sir agar ye politeness hai to phir aap chilla ke baat karte ho to kaise karte honge.
Customer: Nahi wahi to keh raha hu aap jo keh rahe ho ki wo thoda sa wait kariye thoda sa wait kariye ye kya hota hai.
Executive: Main keh raha hu sir business main convert karke de dunga aapko phir phir wahi baat maine kaha kya you will be able to convert ye cheez aap nahi keh rahe ho lekin karna to yahi chah rahe ho na ki aap mujhe ek week ke andar karna nahi chah inquiry nahi bad rahi hai inquiry ka flow nahi bad raha hai.
Customer: Badhi hai aap nahi bad rahi hai.
Executive: 186 last month aayi thi uske pehle jab bhi aati thi aapke average out 140 40 kuch aati thi aur abhi jo 186 hui is nahi bad rahi hai nahi bad rahi hai meri baat samajh me aa rahi hai.
Customer: Calls badh rahi hai sir nahi badh rahi hai calls bhi nahi badh rahi hai.
Customer: September mein aap check karoge ya main check karu are main to main to dekh raha hu sir apne screen pe graph mein tabhi to bol raha hu main.
Customer: Suno Ashraf meri baat ko bade dhyan se suno aap agar main jo chah raha hu na outcome sahi nahi raha to isko trust seal me switch kar do main nahi keh raha hu tum refund karo tumhare bas ke bahar ki cheeze mujhe pata hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm hmm.
Customer: Hai na isko trust seal me switch karo to saaf seedhi baat hai.
Customer: Meri baat samajh me aa rahi hai.
Executive: Ek baar main discuss kar leta hu mam se ha samajh me aa raha hai kyuki jo hai na ye aap log ke bas ke bahar ki cheez ho to main bhi jaan raha hu.
Executive: Actually me sir dekho agar main sahi batau na dekho pehli baat to star maine sell kiya nahi hai aapko main samjha raha actually cheez par aisa bhi nahi hai ki star services kharab hoti hai star services me thoda time lagta hai ab wo kitna time lagta hai ek saal lagta hai ek saal ke liye to service thi are exactly koi time nahi hota hai lekin starting ke two three months me jo hai thoda sa time lagta hai lekin usme bhi aisa nahi hai customer nahi bante bante hain customer wahi to main aap se actually me probe kar raha tha ki kya hai kaisa hai kitne log se discussion hua hai hai na kitne log se discussion karo na koi team hai na aapki are sir koi team nahi hai koi team nahi hai aapko kuch na kuch bol diya hoga as such koi hum aapka data nahi dekh sakte maine aapko pehle hi call pe bola ki aapka lead manager ka data main nahi dekh sakta hu ya mera manager ya uske upar ka manager koi nahi dekh sakta hai agar unhone meri baat ko suno meri baat aap jo karo mera improvement badhao meri baat samajh me aa raha hai mera inquiries flow badhna chahiye hmm hmm meri baat samajh me aa rahi hai na ha sir ye cheez to samjha rahi hai aapki inquiry flow badhna chahiye ha to badhegi bhi lekin ab aap bologe aaj hi aaj badha do to kaise badhegi sir aaj are aaj nahi main keh raha hu kitna time chahiye batao utna time kiya uske baad main call bhi nahi karunga aapke team members ko kitna time kar sakte ho wo to mujhe pata hai mail pe main aapko keh raha hu kitna din mere yahan koi aapko call nahi karega hmm saat aath din hi bolunga main isse jyada to nahi uske baad to aap mujhe phir call kar hi dena ki sir as such improvement to nahi dikh rahi hai aapki taraf se mujhe kuch usme jo main kar sakta hu apne end se bilkul karunga isse jyada time main aapka bhi nahi kharab karunga ki saat aath din se jyada bolu main aapko agar main suno aap agar nahi hota hai na improvement aap khud mujhe mujhe ek baar call kiye sir nahi ho pa raha mujhse isko trust seal me switch kar do koi problem nahi main complaint bhi nahi karunga main samajh raha hu aapke bahar ki cheez hai aapke bahar ki cheez hai refund karna wo to aap keh rahe ho mujhe achi tarah janta hu aur mere paas itna vella time nahi hai ki main court kacheri karu lakh lakh ha wo to main samajh raha hu sir wo to baat samajh me matlab nahi sir time waste karenge aapka to main samajh raha hu sir lekin mujhe bhi problem hai sir ek cheez se aapke paas batao nahi are ki matlab jaise jaise aap services bahut ache use kar rahe ho sara kuch use bhi acha hai call bhi bahut ache aa rahi hai receiving bhi acha hai to kyu customer koi aapko kyu mujhe response nahi de rahe ki maine kaha main suno suno Ashraf main MDC chalate chalate trust seal me aaya wahan improvement raha tabhi main isme aaya ki chalo is cheez ko better karte hain lekin aisa kuch hua nahi acha acha are to ek bhi conversion aaya ki nahi sir is beech matlab kehne ka matlab kuch bhi nahi faltu keh raha hu na ki faltu cheeze aa rahi hai isse pehle hua karta tha india mart usme abhi bahut changes mujhe mahsus ho raha hai acha acha theek hai aap acha ek cheez aur wo cheez aap samajh paye ki nahi jis kya ho gaya matlab jo main isko kar raha hu category ko accept nahi kar rahe hain hai nahi us pe kuch negative
summary:
Concerns:

- Inquiries are poor and need improvement.

- Restrictions are occurring, review process unclear.

- Wants better results or switch to TrustSeal.

- Dissatisfied with current service performance.



Resolution:

- Executive explained category restrictions.

- Executive checked service history, call dates.

- Executive offered to discuss TrustSeal switch with manager.

- Executive will check for improvements in 7-8 days.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will discuss TrustSeal switch with manager.

- Executive will check for improvements in 7-8 days.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- inquiries, trustseal, restrictions, improvement, category
